name: Vampire: the Regicide
description:
It is a quiet night in Krakow, and the Prince has just been murdered.

You are Mikael, a young Ventrue with no memories of his mortal life. When a power struggle in the wake of the Prince's death leaves the Sheriff and Seneschal unwilling to work together, the investigation of his murder falls to you.

Joining you is Kira, the only childe of the dead Prince Aleksander. Together, you must investigate the scene of the crime, interrogate your suspects, and  bring the killer to justice before the loss of its Prince sends Krakow crumbling into chaos. 

Aleksander was known as a just and beloved Prince - who could have wanted him dead? And what could have driven them to it?

Vampire: the Regicide is a visual novel with five unique endings, original character art, a full soundtrack, and a list of definitions for players unfamiliar with the setting (accessible via the ESC key)!  An average playthrough takes roughly 1-1.5 hours.

This game was made for the    Vampire: The Masquerade Jam 2022 using   the "Love Among Monsters" prompt.   It was created in only a month, so if you run into any bugs, please let us know so we can fix them!

Content warnings:  This game contains setting-typical amounts of violence and blood, as well as brief instances that could trigger ommeta/scopophobia.

Developed by:
Jen - Art
Liam Coakley - Writing, Music Directing, Lore-Knowing, Discord-Joining
Megan - Writing, Production
Perdix - Coding,  UI
The Anti Virals - Music
